Topic.Title: how do I get rid of the annoying '>Type here' prompt?  I just want the cursor.

Posts.EditableText:
Can't find any setting but can't believe I can't turn off something so atypical.  Anybody who has played IF for more than one sentence will know to type there!
thanks
Posts.HTML:
Can't find any setting but can't believe I can't turn off something so atypical. Anybody who has played IF for more than one sentence will know to type there!
thanks

Posts.EditableText:
Go to the _Features_ tab of the game object, and tick "Show advanced scripts...". Then go to the _Advanced scripts_ tab, and for the top script, "User interface initialisation...", click on code view, and add this line:
```
JS.setInterfaceString ("TypeHereLabel", "")
Posts.HTML:
Go to the Features tab of the game object, and tick "Show advanced scripts...". Then go to the Advanced scripts tab, and for the top script, "User interface initialisation...", click on code view, and add this line:

JS.setInterfaceString ("TypeHereLabel", "")

Posts.EditableText: This is a good find, was wondering the same thing!
Posts.HTML: This is a good find, was wondering the same thing!
